meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be absorbed.
meanings.sent1: The absorbability of the sponge made it perfect for cleaning up spills.
meanings.sent2: The absorbability of the paper towel allowed it to soak up the excess water.
meanings.sent3: The absorbability of the towel was so impressive that it seemed to drink up the entire puddle in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her absorbability for new information was like a sponge, quickly taking in everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The absorbability of the soil determined how well the plants could take in nutrients.

meanings.definition: The ability to be soaked up or taken in.
meanings.sent1: The absorbability of the fabric made it perfect for drying dishes.
meanings.sent2: The absorbability of the sponge allowed it to soak up all the spilled milk.
meanings.sent3: The absorbability of the towel was so high that it seemed to magically disappear the water.
meanings.sent4: His absorbability for new ideas was like a sponge, eagerly taking in every detail.
meanings.sent5: The absorbability of the sponge was so impressive that it could absorb water in an instant.
